page.title: 17Rue Des Pres Trading Estate
page.content: The estate, built on 50 vergees of meadow land, was established in 1970. The site{on the edge of St.Helier afforded{good communications with the {harbour and retail outlets,}and a suitable location for previously unfavourably located light industries. {Eighteen diverse industries and {companies}use the site, ranging from National Panasonic to Channel Printers and La Motte garages. Most companies now hold the freehold but States control of development is retained. The success of Rue Des Pres is attributed by many companies to both, 'being left to get on with the job without anyone complaining about noise or inconvenience' and, the workshop capacity which allows extensive storage and precision engineering.
